item.title: MCSD, Texting from Chrome, Finally changed web hosting providers, Nutrition tracking
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: I’ve always been interested in some sort of Microsoft certification, and have always had it in the back of my mind to try to complete one of them. This morning I discovered a new track that is perfect and right up my alley; MCSD: Web Applications Developer. Most of the preparation for these exams can be completed via Pluralsight – so Iâ€™m definitely going to try to commit to at least attempting this certification.
